trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> system procedure sets the connection access permission for the user specified.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> system procedure sets the connection access permission for the user specified.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_USER_ACCESS</codeph> system procedure sets the connection access permission for the user specified.

trans-unit.source: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

seg-source.mrk: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

target.mrk: An input argument of type VARCHAR(128) that specifies the user ID in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database.

trans-unit.source: Adds the user to the list of users with full access to the database. The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: Adds the user to the list of users with full access to the database.
The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

target.mrk: Adds the user to the list of users with full access to the database.
The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper25025.dita#rrefproper25025">derby.database.fullAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the user to the list of users with read-only access to the database. The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: Adds the user to the list of users with read-only access to the database.
The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

target.mrk: Adds the user to the list of users with read-only access to the database.
The value for the database property is <codeph><xref href="rrefproper39325.dita#rrefproper39325">derby.database.readOnlyAccessUsers</xref></codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the user from the list of permissions, reverting the user to the default permission. You must specify <codeph>null</codeph> without the quotation marks.

seg-source.mrk: Removes the user from the list of permissions, reverting the user to the default permission.
You must specify <codeph>null</codeph> without the quotation marks.

target.mrk: Removes the user from the list of permissions, reverting the user to the default permission.
You must specify <codeph>null</codeph> without the quotation marks.

trans-unit.source: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default. See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information. The database owner can grant access to other users.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

target.mrk: If authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> has execute privileges on this procedure by default.
See "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.
The database owner can grant access to other users.

trans-unit.source: To remove the user from the list of permissions, you specify the <codeph>null</codeph> value without the quotation marks. For example:

seg-source.mrk: To remove the user from the list of permissions, you specify the <codeph>null</codeph> value without the quotation marks.

target.mrk: To remove the user from the list of permissions, you specify the <codeph>null</codeph> value without the quotation marks.
